use_case_intent.value: We want to build an AI agent that helps clinical staff quickly find relevant patient information across our EMR system. Currently, nurses spend 20% of their time searching for data. The agent should summarize patient history, flag critical information, and suggest relevant clinical protocols based on the patient's condition.

timeline.raw: We want to pilot this within 6 months and full rollout in a year

organization_size.raw: Regional hospital network with about 3,000 employees

stakeholder_reality.value: Clinical informatics team sponsors, nursing staff are end users, CISO must approve

integration_surface.summary: Deep integration with Epic required, read-only access to CDS

risk_posture.worst_case: Incorrect information could lead to clinical errors

boundaries.value: Agent will NOT make clinical decisions or prescribe treatments. Human clinician always makes final call.
